channel.title: About on Justin DeBo
channel.description: Recent content in About on Justin DeBo

item.title: Bio
item.description: A little bit about me… I’m an experienced software developer with a love of music. Many years ago I began studying music as a possible career path. Through that pursuit I learned the value of criticism, developed a sense of creativity and got comfortable performing under pressure. Now I try to apply those same skills in the business world - whether it’s setting my ego aside during code reviews, solving architecture challenges infrastructure analysts or making technical topics digestible in executive briefings.
